_element_id.label: CSS ID
_element_id.title: Add your custom id WITHOUT the Pound key. e.g: my-id
_element_id.name: _element_id

_css_classes.label: CSS Classes
_css_classes.title: Add your custom class WITHOUT the dot. e.g: my-class
_css_classes.name: _css_classes

_background_attachment_alert.raw: Note: Attachment Fixed works only on desktop.
_background_attachment_alert.name: _background_attachment_alert

_background_video_link.label: Video Link
_background_video_link.description: YouTube link or video file (mp4 is recommended).
_background_video_link.name: _background_video_link

_background_video_fallback.label: Background Fallback
_background_video_fallback.description: This cover image will replace the background video in case that the video could not be loaded.
_background_video_fallback.name: _background_video_fallback

_background_hover_attachment_alert.raw: Note: Attachment Fixed works only on desktop.
_background_hover_attachment_alert.name: _background_hover_attachment_alert

_background_hover_video_link.label: Video Link
_background_hover_video_link.description: YouTube link or video file (mp4 is recommended).
_background_hover_video_link.name: _background_hover_video_link

_background_hover_video_fallback.label: Background Fallback
_background_hover_video_fallback.description: This cover image will replace the background video in case that the video could not be loaded.
_background_hover_video_fallback.name: _background_hover_video_fallback

_position_description.raw: Please note! Custom positioning is not considered best practice for responsive web design and should not be used too frequently.
_position_description.name: _position_description

responsive_description.raw: Responsive visibility will take effect only on preview or live page, and not while editing in Elementor.
responsive_description.name: responsive_description

_attributes.label: Custom Attributes
_attributes.description: Set custom attributes for the wrapper element. Each attribute in a separate line. Separate attribute key from the value using | character.
_attributes.name: _attributes

custom_css_title.raw: Add your own custom CSS here
custom_css_title.name: custom_css_title

custom_css_description.raw:
Use "selector" to target wrapper element. Examples:
selector {color: red;} // For main element
selector .child-element {margin: 10px;} // For child element
.my-class {text-align: center;} // Or use any custom selector
custom_css_description.name: custom_css_description
